ChecklistItem: Validation of codebase for generic forbidden tokens or patterns.
Parent POM validation for correct Group, Artifact, and Version.
Validation of mandatory properties in pom.xml.
Validation of forbidden plugins in pom.xml.
Validation of forbidden dependencies in pom.xml.
Validation of IBM MQ Connector configuration for approved Cipher Suite.
Validation of required dependencies (e.g., apimuleutilities).
Validation of mule-artifact.json for minimum Mule version, Java version, and secure properties.
Validation that API Autodiscovery is enabled in the application.
Validation to ensure no unsupported error handling expressions are used.
Validation to ensure no legacy attributes (fromApplicationCode, toApplicationCode) are present.
Validation to ensure no DLP-related properties are present.
Validation to ensure no legacy JCE Encryption implementation is used.
Validation of Crypto JCE configuration for mandatory type attribute.
Validation to ensure the 'tobase64' function is not used.
Validation of HTTP Listener paths to ensure standard naming conventions (no /test, /temp).
Validation to ensure no hardcoded versions are used for connector dependencies in pom.xml.
Validation to ensure key configuration properties (Host, Port, User, Password) are externalized.
Validation to ensure connector timeouts (responseTimeout, etc.) are explicitly configured and externalized.
Generic Config validation for mandatory tokens in property files.
Validation of mandatory properties in environment configuration files.
Validation of mandatory policy properties in policy files.
Validation of policy versions to ensure they match required standards.
Validation of Secure Properties format in secure.properties.
Validation of Client ID mapping format in policy files.
Validation of forbidden keys or values (e.g., hardcoded passwords, TODOs) in configuration files.
Validation of forbidden keys in policy files.
Validation to ensure no IP addresses are hardcoded in property files.
